RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso

RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso Class Reference

#include <ercreateperso.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The Irrlicht Event Recever for gsCreatePerso.

The Irrlicht IDs are reserved from 10000 to 10100 for the choice selection popup.

Warning:
This class is instancied and set up to the IrrlichtDevice in the gsGame::run(). If we set up this in gsGame::init(), the IrrlichtDevice isn't yet initialized and it may cause a SegFault.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso::changePersoFormModifier (  )  [private]

Changes the character creation form modifider.

In the main form, near the attribute name, is a StaticText that must show the modifier applied to this attribute.

Its color must be green for + and red for -.

void RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso::choicePreselection ( s32  id,
tPersoAttrbHandler *  h,
IGUIListBox *  listBox 
) [private]

Handle the preselection of a choice.

First, we get the caller buttin caption. We also need the BonusFile fiename to test if the caption is a choice.

Parameters:
id The id of the caller
h The tPersoAttrbHandler of the attribute
listBox The widget containing all the choice of the BonusFile

bool RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso::controlBefore ( IGUIElement *  root  )  [private]

Makes some control before creating perso.

It simply returns the value of choiceSelected.

Parameters:
root the root IGUIElement as return by IGUIEnvironment::getRootGUIElement()
Returns:
true if the controls are passed, false it they fail.

bool RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso::handleBonusFileButton ( s32  id,
IGUIElement *  root,
erCreatePerso *  tThis 
) [static, private]

Handle the BonusFile button click action.

If a BonusFile button was clicked, it set changeButtonId to the button Id and call createChoiceWindow() with a pointer to the corresponding AttrbHandlerListItem.

Parameters:
id The Irrlicht id of the event caller
root The Irrlicht root GUI element
tThis A pointer to this instance.
Returns:
true if the event is handle.

void RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso::removePreselectionModidifers (  )  [private]

Remove the preselection modifiers if needed.

It uses isPresel to know if a presel exists.

void RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso::roll ( IGUIElement *  root,
erCreatePerso *  tThis 
) [static, private]

Makes a new roll for RandomLvl perso attributes.

This class is static to get access to thegsCreatePerso::getHandlerList() function.

The tThis pointer get access to the current erCreatePerso instance but none test is done, so if this pointer is NULL, this cause a segfault.

Parameters:
root The root IGUIElement pointer
tThis A pointer to the current erCreatePerso instance

bool RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso::choiceSelected [private]

Was a choice selected.

Used by controlBefore to test if a choice was selected. Its value is modified by showChoice.

bool RainbruRPG::Events::erCreatePerso::isPresel [private]

Is a preselection exists.

If a preselection was made for this BonusFile, we must know it to remove modifiers.
